canRevealNow(uint256).details: Provides detailed status for reveal readiness

returns.canReveal: True if lottery can be revealed now
returns.reason: Human-readable reason if cannot reveal, empty string if can reveal

claimPrize(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Gas cost is automatically deducted from prize amount

params._ticketIndex: Index of the ticket to claim
params._ticketSecret: The ticket secret that matches the stored hash

closeCommitPeriod(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone to transition state after commit deadline

commitTicket(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: User must commit before the deadline to be eligible for prizes

params._ticketIndex: Index of the ticket to commit
params._ticketSecretHash: Hash of the ticket secret for later verification

createLottery(bytes32,bytes32[],uint256[.details: Creator must deposit total prize pool in ETH, optionally including rollover funds

params._creatorCommitment: Hash of creator's secret for randomness
params._prizeValues: Array of prize amounts in wei
params._revealTime: Timestamp when lottery can be revealed
params._rolloverLotteryId: Optional: lottery ID to pull rollover funds from (0 for none)
params._ticketSecretHashes: Array of hashes for ticket secrets

returns.lotteryId: Unique identifier for the created lottery

finalizeLottery(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone after claim deadline to forfeit unclaimed prizes

getLotteryCreator(uint256).details: Returns creator address and commitment hash

getLotteryPrizes(uint256).details: Returns total prize pool and individual prize values

returns.totalPrizePool: Total USDC in the prize pool

getLotteryReveal(uint256).details: Returns random seed and current state

returns.randomSeed: Generated random seed (0 if not revealed)

getLotteryStatus(uint256).details: Returns state and all deadline timestamps

returns.revealTime: Timestamp when lottery can be revealed

getLotteryTickets(uint256).details: Returns array of ticket secret hashes

returns.ticketSecretHashes: Array of hashes for ticket secrets

getRandomnessBlock(uint256).details: Returns the block number that will be used for entropy generation

returns.randomnessBlock: Block number for entropy source (0 if not set yet)

getRolloverPool(uint256).details: Returns the amount of forfeited prizes available for future lotteries

returns.rolloverAmount: Amount of ETH available in the rollover pool

getTotalRolloverPool().details: Sums up all rollover pools to show total available for new lotteries

returns.totalRollover: Total amount of ETH available from all rollover pools

isClaimPeriodActive(uint256).details: Returns true if lottery revealed and before claim deadline

returns._0: bool True if claim period is active

isCommitPeriodOpen(uint256).details: Returns true if lottery is in CommitOpen state and before deadline

returns._0: bool True if commit period is open

isRevealReady(uint256).details: Returns true if commit period closed, reveal time reached, and randomness block reached

returns._0: bool True if lottery can be revealed

refundLottery(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone if creator fails to reveal within 24 hours of reveal time

revealLottery(uint256,bytes).details: Only callable by lottery creator after reveal time with correct secret

params._creatorSecret: The creator's secret that matches the commitment

canRevealNow(uint256).notice: Check if lottery can be revealed now and get reason if not

claimPrize(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Claim a prize for a winning ticket with gasless claiming

closeCommitPeriod(uint256).notice: Update lottery state to CommitClosed if deadline has passed

commitTicket(uint256,uint256,bytes32).notice: Commit a ticket to participate in the lottery

createLottery(bytes32,bytes32[],uint256[.notice: Create a new lottery with hidden prize values

finalizeLottery(uint256).notice: Finalize lottery and process unclaimed prizes after claim deadline

getLotteryStatus(uint256).notice: Get lottery status and timing information

getRandomnessBlock(uint256).notice: Get the randomness block number for a lottery

getRolloverPool(uint256).notice: Get available rollover pool balance from a finalized lottery

getTotalRolloverPool().notice: Get total available rollover funds across all finalized lotteries

isClaimPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Check if claim period is currently active

isCommitPeriodOpen(uint256).notice: Check if commit period is currently open

isRevealReady(uint256).notice: Check if lottery is ready to be revealed

lotteries(uint256).notice: Mapping from lottery ID to lottery data

lotteryCounter().notice: Counter for generating unique lottery IDs

lotteryRolloverPool(uint256).notice: Mapping from lottery ID to rollover pool for forfeited prizes

refundLottery(uint256).notice: Refund lottery prize pool to creator if reveal fails

revealLottery(uint256,bytes).notice: Reveal the lottery and assign prizes to committed tickets

tickets(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping from lottery ID to ticket index to ticket commitment
